creditline: Gift of Margaret V. B. Wurtele
description: standing male figure wearing a black brimmed hat, blue jacket with V neck and blue knickers with red and yellow designs, and black heeled shoes, with a very small plow in front of him, being pulled by two small oxen wearing yokes; man holds a J-shaped twig/switch in his PL hand
markings: labels on underside: (two gallery labels) | at corner of base behind PR foot of figure: (label fragment)
title: San Isidro
